text: Suspect charged with killing UnitedHealthcare's CEO as an act of terrorism  —  The man accused of killing UnitedHealthcare's CEO has been charged with murder as an act of terrorism, prosecutors said Tuesday as they worked to bring him to a New York court from a Pennsylvania jail.
